import React from 'react' const initialState = { name : '', sku : '', description : '', price : '0', suplier : '' } class ProductRegister extends React.Component{ state = initialState; onChange = (event) => { const value = event.target.value const field = event.target.name this.setState({ [field] : value }) } onSubmit = (event) => { console.log(this.state) } cleanFields = () => { this.setState(initialState) } render(){ return(
